name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Curtis GRAY, Appellee

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Curtis GRAY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Based upon our disposition in Commonwealth v. Williams, 557 Pa. 285, 733 A.2d 593 (1999), we affirm the Order of the Lancaster County Court of Common Pleas dated January 07, 1999. Furthermore, we remand the matter to the common pleas court for disposition of any remaining issues.
Jurisdiction is relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Joseph C. Madenspacher, District Attorney, Susan E. Moyer, Asst. District Attorney, for Com.
James J. Karl, Chief Public Defender, for Curtis Gray.
casebody.head_matter:
734 A.2d 1285
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Curtis GRAY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Aug. 3, 1999.
Decided Sept. 9, 1999.
Joseph C. Madenspacher, District Attorney, Susan E. Moyer, Asst. District Attorney, for Com.
James J. Karl, Chief Public Defender, for Curtis Gray.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, and SAYLOR, JJ.
